mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order(id, user_id, region_code , good_id, good_name, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{regionCode}, #{goodId}, #{goodName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, region_code AS regionCode, good_id AS goodId, good_name AS goodName, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_order WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, region_code AS regionCode, good_id AS goodId, good_name AS goodName, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_order WHERE id = #{orderId}
